<h1 id="firstHeading" class="firstHeading" lang="en" itemprop="name">Level 40 stats table</h1>				<div id="bodyContent" class="mw-body-content">
					<div id="siteSub" class="noprint">From Fire Emblem Heroes Wiki</div>					<div id="contentSub"></div>
										<div id="jump-to-nav" class="mw-jump">
						Jump to:						<a href="#mw-head">navigation</a>, 						<a href="#p-search">search</a>
					</div>
					<div id="mw-content-text" lang="en" dir="ltr" class="mw-content-ltr"><div class="mw-parser-output"><ul><li>This table shows the 5<img alt="â˜…" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/feheroes_gamepedia_en/images/4/4e/Icon_Rarity_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/20?cb=20180513213448" decoding="async" width="20" height="20" srcset="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/feheroes_gamepedia_en/images/4/4e/Icon_Rarity_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/30?cb=20180513213448 1.5x, https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/feheroes_gamepedia_en/images/4/4e/Icon_Rarity_5.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/40?cb=20180513213448 2x" /> <b>average</b> max level base stat values for each hero. It does not include <a href="/Stat_Growth" class="mw-redirect" title="Stat Growth">stat variance</a>. Also see <a href="/Level_40_unrounded_stats_table" title="Level 40 unrounded stats table">Level 40 unrounded stats table</a> for what these stats would look like without rounding.</li>
<li>Stat values in this table <b>do not include</b> weapon or passive stats.</li>
<li>When sorting the table, any rows with identical values will keep their relative order from before the last sorting operation.</li>
<li>For more specialized charts, see <a href="/Specialized_Charts" class="mw-redirect" title="Specialized Charts">here</a>.</li></ul>
<p><script data-colors="Red,Blue,Green,Colorless" data-move-types="Infantry,Armored,Cavalry,Flying" data-weapon-types="Sword,Lance,Axe,Bow,Dagger,Magic,Staff,Dragonstone,Beast" data-weapon-classes="Close,Ranged,Melee,Missile,Physical,Magical">!function(){"use strict";var e=document.currentScript;if(e)var t=setInterval(function(){var n;try{n=mw.loader.using&&$&&"loading"!==document.readyState}catch(e){return}n&&(clearInterval(t),mw.loader.using("oojs-ui-core",function(){var t="All",n=$(".hero-filter-element");function a(e,n){return new OO.ui.DropdownWidget({indicator:"down",label:e,menu:{items:[t].concat(n.split(",")).map(function(e){return new OO.ui.MenuOptionWidget({label:e})})}})}var o=a("Color",e.dataset.colors),i=a("Weapon Types",e.dataset.weaponTypes),s=a("Move Types",e.dataset.moveTypes),r=o.getMenu(),l=s.getMenu(),d=i.getMenu();function c(){var e=r.findSelectedItem(),a=d.findSelectedItem(),o=l.findSelectedItem();n.css("display",function(){var n=(this.dataset.weaponProps||"").split(";");return e&&e.getLabel()!==t&&!(n.indexOf(e.getLabel())>-1)||a&&a.getLabel()!==t&&!(n.indexOf(a.getLabel())>-1)||o&&o.getLabel()!==t&&this.dataset.moveType!==o.getLabel()?"none":""})}d.$element.append("<hr/>"),d.addItems(e.dataset.weaponClasses.split(",").map(function(e){return new OO.ui.MenuOptionWidget({label:e})})),o.$element.css("max-width","9em"),i.$element.css("max-width","12em"),s.$element.css("max-width","10em"),r.on("choose",c),l.on("choose",c),d.on("choose",c),new OO.ui.HorizontalLayout({items:[o,i,s]}).$element.insertAfter(e)}))},1e3)}();</script>
</p>
